meanings.def: a curved piece of glass or plastic that makes things look larger, smaller or clearer when you look through it
examples: a pair of glasses with tinted lenses
Put your hand in front of your right lens and just look through your left lens.
She wears glasses with very thick lenses.

meanings.def: a piece of equipment that is part of a camera, containing one or more lenses
examples: a camera with an adjustable lens
a view of Mount Kilimanjaro as seen through Eddie's camera lens
a long-lens shot of a rare bird

meanings.def: a contact lens (= a small round piece of thin plastic that you put on your eye to help you see better)
examples: Have you got your lenses in?

meanings.def: the clear part of the eye, behind the pupil, that focuses light so that you can see clearly
